narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.  This was the first prelicense inspection of this applicant. 
The applicant is ready for a USDA Class "A" license.  License fee will be sent by the applicant to:
USDA/APHIS/Animal Care
920 Main Campus Drive, Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27606
 
An exit interview was conducted with a facility representative and microchip concurrence was explained. 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
Additional Inspectors
Neis Cynthia, Compliance Specialist
